reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater soft, comfortable, and perfect for changing weather, with nice colors and a perfect weight for fall.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars “Yeppers” - Michael Scott
items.body: This shirt is SO soft. Super cozy. Beautiful color, material and fit. It doesn’t stick to your belly or ride up. For size reference: I don’t know what the hell the numbers on the guides mean but I normally wear a large comfortably in most shirts unless I want a snug fit then I am a medium and the large was perfectly oversized for the start of fall. I didn’t feel frumpy or boxy while wearing it. It arrived in two days and was significantly better quality than I expected. Extremely lightweight yet somehow kept me perfectly warm all day. It looked soft but we all know how reviews can be so I didn’t really think it would come exactly as it looked on the model. But I was pleasantly surprised. I legitimately am going to buy a couple more in the other colors just because this shirt made me feel fantastic. Read more
items.author: Jade

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great top at a great price!
items.body: This is one of the best tops I got from Amazon! It is soft, comfortable and wears well. It is a longer top and fits well. The size of the top is very generous. Read more
items.author: Mike Eddinger

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice looking sweater. A little different than others so you have variety
items.body: Not wild about the color. I think mine is a little lighter than the picture. Not the best look for my coloring. The sweater/shirt is very soft and comfortable. The sleeve are long enough, which seems to be rare now a days. Style is a nice change from your typical sweater. I have washed it inside out to help prevent little "pullies". I dry it hanging over the open washing machine top. It comes out fine and has not shrunk. Read more
items.author: grandma to 12 boys

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very cute and good quality for the price!
items.body: This lightweight sweater is so cute. It is long enough to tuck in or wear outside of jeans or dress pant. The cheetah print on the sleeves is very soft fabric. With so many color combinations to choose from, I will be ordering more! Great quality. Read more
items.author: J.F.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Recommend
items.body: Super soft, comfortable, light weight but warm enough for fall or winter. great length, perfect size. Color is as pictured. Have gotten compliments. Read more
items.author: J. H.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it!
items.body: This is a great top. It fits perfectly and the color is great. Its very comfortable and so soft. Ive worn it a lot. It has just the right amount of stretch for size D breasts and will go with dress pants or casual. Read more
items.author: Karol Goforth

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lt Wt Pink Sweater-Like Top
items.body: So soft and very cute. Runs a bit large but it’s comfy. Pink colors nice trimmed in an off white/creme. Washes nice on color cycle and dries quickly. Didn’t shrink. I love it. Read more
items.author: bevvygale

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Really Comfy and Soft.
items.body: I bought this item with a wavering thought. I was not sure it would fit how I want it to but to my surprise it’s gorgeous, I love it. The size was perfectly matching. I’m a Size Medium, 5’ 5’ built, 161 lbs. I’m warm and comfy, fabric quality very nice and soft. It does not shrink. Totally washable Read more
items.author: Ms. Judith

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: 02-navy Blue, 08-light Purple, 04-apricot, 04-pink, 08-green Plaid, 05-hot Pink, 08-red Yellow Plaid, 01-khaki, 08-red, 02-green, 03-caramel, 05-teal Blue, 02-black, 05-blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
